appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: This plugin allows you to automatically solve CAPTCHAs found on any webpage.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

accountKeyTitle.message: Please enter your Anti-Captcha.com account key.

accountKeyTitleTitle.message: Enter your Anti-Captcha.com account key here

noAccountKeyInfo.message:
X This plugin requires a special key to get the job done.
You need to register on Anti-Captcha.com.
Then add funds and place here the key you can find in "Settings" -> "API setup" section of the website.

autoSubmitFormInfo.message:
This functional may work incorrect on certain websites.
Uncheck it if a webpage reloads after solving.

useRecaptchaAcceleratorInfo.message:
This feature allows you to let us solve the Recaptcha2 faster by providing minor HTML data that surrounds a Recaptcha block.
By using this HTML data (on an anti-captcha.com side) we can fool a Recaptcha2 so it thinks that it's being solved on an actual web site.
No important data is sent, no input values, not a complete HTML. Only cropped code that includes .g-recaptcha element subtree.
For example: <body><main class='main'><form action='/sendForm'><input type='text' name='somename'><div class='g-recaptcha'></div></form></main></body>
All the attributes except id, class, role, type, name, method, action are stripped.
Please be patient, we are still working on this features but we belive it's gonna save you time and so money!

useRecaptchaPrecachingInfo.message:
New feature allows you to reduce Recaptcha solving time twice or even more, depending on your usage regime.
More info on a debug page here: Recaptcha precache information

precachingKNumberInfo.message: The number of extra not occupied tasks for precaching. Automatic algorithm adjusts the number between min and max for a better performance and less spending. Recommended: Min=2, Max=4.

solveRecaptcha2.message: Solve reCAPTCHA 2 (I'm not a robot) automatically

solveRecaptcha2Info.message: You may turn off this option if you don't need a reCAPTCHA 2 being solved when it's found on a web page. Regular image CAPTCHA will work as usual.

solveInvisibleRecaptcha2Title.message: Turn On/Off invisibile reCAPTCHA automatic solving

solveInvisibleRecaptcha2Info.message: Solve a reCAPTCHA that looks like a small badge that's usually in a right bottom corner of the web page.

dontReuseRecaptchaSolutionTitle.message: Turn Off/On previous reCAPTCHA 2 solution reusage

dontReuseRecaptchaSolution.message: Do not reuse previous reCAPTCHA 2 solution on the same web-page

dontReuseRecaptchaSolutionInfo.message: A new recaptcha solving process will start for a newly appeared recaptcha box even if there is another reCAPTCHA 2 recently solved (and not yet expired) on this web-page. If off then new solving process will start only after previous solution (on the same web-page) expires.

solveFuncaptchaInfo.message:
Turn on if you want Funcaptcha being automatically solved.
ATTENTION!!! You need to enable Funcaptcha Proxyless tasks first in API settings web-page to make this task type work in this plugin.

solveGeetestInfo.message: Turn on if you want Geetest being automatically solved.

startRecaptcha2SolvingWhenChallengeShown.message: Turn On/Off solving when a challenge box is shown mode
Start reCAPTCHA 2 solving only when a challenge box is shown
A solving process will start only when a reCAPTCHA challenge box with images and stuff is shown. Useful for invisible reCAPTCHA 2: gonna save you some money and will prevent unnecessary callbacks.

solveOnlyPresentedRecaptcha2Title.message: Do not solve hidden on a web-page reCAPTCHA 2

solveOnlyPresentedRecaptcha2.message: Solve only presented (not hidden) on a web-page reCAPTCHA 2

solveOnlyPresentedRecaptcha2Info.message: Differs from the previous option that if it's ON it will only solve a reCAPTCHA 2 that is actually visible on a web-page. A reCAPTCHA 2 located in an invisible or hidden container won't be solved.

usePredefinedImageCaptchaMarksTitle.message: Turn On/Off automatic image CAPTCHA selection and solution

usePredefinedImageCaptchaMarks.message: Use predefined regular image CAPTCHA marks

usePredefinedImageCaptchaMarksInfo.message: Regular image CAPTCHA will be automatically found, marked and solved on every web page. It's based on selection of other users, but all your local marks will have priority anyway. Disable if you don't want image CAPTCHAs being solved everywhere they are found.

playSoundsInfo.message: The Plugin plays sound when CAPTCHA found, while solving process and in case of success or error.

leaveFeedbackTitle.message: Leave feedback or report a problem about our extension

getAntiCaptchaKey.message: Get Anti-Captcha.com key.

getFreeAttempts.message: You can get $captchas_count$ free captchas if you authorise in your Google account in this browser

newVersionCrxAutoupdate.message: Plugin will be automatically updated to the newest version.

newVersionZipDownloadLink.message: New version $new_version$ of the plug-in available for downloading.

markInputTitle.message: Mark input as captcha solution destination (CTRL+SHIFT+3)

unmarkImageTitle.message: Unmark image as captcha source when you press here

unmarkInputTitle.message: Unmark input as captcha solution destination when you press here

agingRecaptchaTitle.message: Captcha solution will be expired in %s seconds.

imageAutosearchTitle.message: Find and solve CAPTCHA image for this input (CTRL+SHIFT+6)
